issue.title: Robot Pose Not Updated After Task Teleportation

content.raw:
Your changes in #53 are for a different 'unique*' world than the default one (position of wheel, dish, finish line all has changed). I was able to teleport without crashing but the world is new.
I see there are too many changes in those 3 files. Would you be able to provide a fix for the default world?
I have been working with the default world so far, and would like to revert to it so we can finish our testing there.
